slide1.title: Welcome to <1>Elite Stuff Trade</1>
slide1.subtitle: Explore an exclusive collection of luxury watches, high-end sneakers, and designer apparel.

slide2.title: Discover <1>Timeless Elegance</1>
slide2.subtitle: Curated watches from world-renowned brands like Rolex, Patek Philippe, and more.

slide3.title: Step Up Your <1>Style Game</1>
slide3.subtitle: The latest trends in designer apparel and exclusive sneaker drops.

categories.title: Featured Collections
categories.subtitle: Discover curated selections from the world's most sought-after luxury brands.

watches.title: Luxury Timepieces
watches.description: Explore iconic watches from Rolex, Patek Philippe, and Audemars Piguet.

sneakers.title: High-End Sneakers
sneakers.description: Find limited edition Nikes, Adidas Yeezys, and designer collaborations.

apparel.title: Designer Apparel
apparel.description: Shop the latest collections from Gucci, Prada, Balenciaga, and more.

featured.title: Our Featured Selection
featured.subtitle: Handpicked luxury items, curated just for you.
featured.noProducts: No featured products available at the moment.

styleAdvisor.title: Need Style Guidance?
styleAdvisor.subtitle: Discover your perfect luxury look. Our AI Style Advisor offers personalized recommendations for watches, sneakers, apparel, and more, tailored to your unique taste.

brandShowcase.title: Shop by Brand
brandShowcase.subtitle: Discover products from your favorite luxury brands.

footer.description: Your premier destination for curated luxury goods, offering an exclusive selection of watches, high-end sneakers, designer apparel, and accessories from the world's most sought-after brands.

collection.title: Luxury Collection
collection.subtitle: Explore curated high-end items.
collection.noProducts: No products match your current filter criteria.

advisor.title: Personal Luxury Advisor
advisor.description: Tell us your preferences, and our AI will craft personalized advice and suggest relevant products from our collection.

form.intendedUseCasePlaceholder: e.g., Everyday Wear, Special Event, Collecting

result.noProducts: Our AI provided style advice above. While no specific products from our current collection were highlighted this time, feel free to browse!

advisor.useCasePlaceholder: e.g., Everyday Wear, Special Event, Collecting
advisor.advisorDescription: Tell us your preferences, and our AI will craft personalized advice and suggest relevant products from our collection.
advisor.resultDescription: Based on your preferences, we recommend the following products:
advisor.noResult: No products found for your preferences. Please try adjusting your criteria.
advisor.errorFetchingAdvice: Error fetching advice. Please try again.
advisor.heroImageAlt: Stylish woman with luxury accessories, including watches, sunglasses, and handbags

chatbot.title: AI Luxury Assistant
chatbot.description: Ask about products, brands, styles, or availability. E.g., "Show me Rolex watches" or "Any Gucci bags?"
chatbot.startConversation: Start the conversation by typing below.
chatbot.errorMessage: Sorry, I encountered an error while trying to help. Please try again later.
chatbot.openOrderPrompt: Please provide specific details for your order. For example: 'I want a yellow Rolex watch, model number 12345, with a green dial.' You can also attach an image. Your full profile information will be sent with this message.
chatbot.orderSentSuccess: Your order request has been sent to our admin team. They will contact you shortly to discuss the details.
chatbot.orderSentError: Sorry, there was an error processing your order request. Please try again later.

auth.welcomeBackDescription: Sign in to access your account and explore luxury goods.
auth.createAccountDescription: Join Elite Stuff Trade to discover exclusive items.

toast.signUpSuccessDescription: Your account has been successfully created. Welcome to Elite Stuff Trade!
toast.emailAlreadyInUse: This email is already registered. Please sign in or use a different email.
toast.signInSuccessDescription: Welcome back to Elite Stuff Trade!
toast.invalidCredentials: Invalid credentials or an unexpected error occurred.

validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters.
validation.phoneNumberMinLength: Phone number must be at least 7 digits.
validation.phoneNumberDigitsOnly: Phone number must contain only digits.

profile.title: Your Profile
profile.accountDescription: Manage your account information and settings.
profile.signOutSuccess: You have been successfully signed out.
profile.signOutError: Failed to sign out. Please try again.
profile.noOrders: You haven't placed any orders yet.
profile.wishlistDescription: Browse your saved items and move them to your cart.
profile.wishlistEmpty: Your wishlist is empty. Start adding items!
profile.wishlistEmptyDescription: It looks like you haven't added any items to your favorites yet.
profile.savedAddressesDescription: Your saved shipping addresses. You can edit or delete them.
profile.noAddresses: You haven't saved any shipping addresses yet.
profile.editAddressDialogDescription: Update the details for your shipping address.
profile.loginPrompt: Please log in to view your profile.
profile.emptyOrderHistory: You haven't placed any orders yet.

cart.reviewItems: Review your selected luxury items below.
cart.cartEmptyMessage: Looks like you haven't added any luxury items yet.
